column10: Who do you currently live with?

column67: I don't feel that I need support, and I don't receive it because I always receive support from my family and friends
Great emotional support from my mother
A friend to share activities with
I don't think I need more support. I feel that the support of my family and close friends is sufficient, and sometimes I feel that it is more than necessary and resembles pity more than support.
I don't need anyone but God... and thank God for that.
I feel like I need emotional support and someone who will listen to me and understand my feelings and fears.
I don't feel safe with my loved ones, and I don't think they are capable of taking care of me.
I desperately need money because we are unemployed.

Psychological support. 
Advice on coping with life's difficulties.
I want to talk to a psychologist or any expert who knows how I can get my life back to how it was.

Psychological support, psychological stability, peace of mind, and I don't want any kind of pressure. I want to get treatment and move on. I want someone reliable to help me because I tried a graduate and he turned out to be rude and took advantage of my psychological state just to have fun. I want to be well so that I can be productive, work, and support myself. my responsibilities and expenses.
Maybe emotional support, encouragement from family.
Supporting inner understanding without pressure or interference
I feel that I need financial support first and foremost, and moral support secondarily
I need financial support to see a doctor, pay university fees, and meet my personal needs, such as minor health needs
I want to talk about my problems and what people judge me for

A sincere friend who keeps his promises, who is trustworthy, who is honest, who is a true friend, who is trustworthy with my secrets, who doesn't judge me when I talk to him about my problems, who understands me and whom I understand.
Sessions with a specialist doctor whom I trust.

A kind word of optimism about the future and a long hug from loved ones.
It can do wonders.
Psychological support to understand and diagnose disorders
I need spiritual and religious support, I think
I don't feel like I'm missing support
Emotional support from friends, especially after losing his dearest friend in the war 😢
I am a business owner and I don't get bored. I am creative. People are the same.
Having close friends is very important to me. Support for me.
All I need is someone telling me that I am good and can do better.
I want to cry... I want to cry freely without anyone hearing me or telling me to be quiet.
Financial, but only in large amounts.
Praise be to God and thanks be to God.
I have lost my sight and I know it.
Psychological support and feeling of security
Relying on myself, distancing myself from the world, loving myself, and taking care of myself
Psychological and social support (Living with my extended family due to distance and separation caused by the war)
Financial support to complete my education, be successful in my work, and help others
I want to bring back my life because I am starting to lose hope completely.
I need support and help to get my rights and lift the injustice that has been done to me.

In the past, I didn't need a psychologist, but with the arrest, torture, war conditions, fleeing the country, and the difficult circumstances we are currently living in, we need to see doctors, but economic circumstances prevent that.
I don't need support at the moment.
Someone who can listen to me
Educational support, living expenses, and medical assistance because I have chronic illnesses

For example, I don't buy things for myself or go on trips with my friends at university because of money, and I am currently looking for a job so that I can continue my university studies and at the same time
I don't feel like I need support
Religious support I want someone to push me, not just comfort me
I need positive and supportive people in my educational journey.

Society and the government understand and appreciate what we are going through as young people who are unable to move forward in their lives and are trying to restore the country to what it used to be, at least
Understanding and appreciation of my needs
Security and return to my homeland
I need someone to listen to me and understand me
Moral support for myself because I can only relax with sedatives
I need someone who listens to me, understands me, and helps me find solutions
I need emotional support from my family
I open up, but I need someone who understands me
I need someone who understands me, loves me, and appreciates me
Bring back security and jobs like before, only better
We need to be merciful to one another, and if we follow the teachings of our religion, we will be a better society
I need my family and friends
Everyone should mind their own business and problems and focus on what benefits them
